task.title: Define the Type of Change
task.shortdesc: Mass update changes include three options: Change Job, Change Salary, or Change Job and Salary. Change details are entered based on the type selected.

step.cmd: From the Define Change Type page, select the type of mass update: Change Job, Change Salary, or Change Job and Salary. Complete the applicable fields.

ul.li:
Enter an Effective Date
The effective date must occur on the same date or later than the most recent job history record for all employees included in the mass update.
Note: The Operating Country is autopopulated from the Company record in UltiPro
